control.name: lblContextLines
control.tooltip: Show lines above and below the word matched

control.name: chkLineNumbers
control.tooltip: Include line numbers before each match

control.name: chkNegation
control.tooltip: Find the files without the Search Text in them

control.name: chkFileNamesOnly
control.tooltip: Show names but not contents of files that have matches (may be faster on large files)

control.name: chkWholeWordOnly
control.tooltip: Only match entire words (not parts of words)

control.name: chkCaseSensitive
control.tooltip: Match upper and lower case letters exactly

control.name: lblAllTypesMessage
control.value: A Text Editor can be used for all unknown types by using a * for the file type.

control.name: lblCmdOptions
control.value: Command Line Optons: %1 - File %2 - Line Number %3 - Column

control.name: lblStoredPaths
control.value: Number of most recently used paths to store

text.name: SaveNoResults
text.value: There are currently no results available to save.

text.name: PrintErrorPageSettings
text.value: An error occurred while trying to load the Page Settings. Make sure you currently have access to a printer. A printer must be connected and accessible for Printing to work.

text.name: PrintErrorPreview
text.value: An error occurred while trying to load the document for Print Preview. Make sure you currently have access to a printer. A printer must be connected and accessible for Printing to work.

text.name: PrintErrorPrint
text.value: An error occurred while trying to load the document for Printing. Make sure you currently have access to a printer. A printer must be connected and accessible for Printing to work.

text.name: PrintErrorDocument
text.value: An error occurred during creation of the document to print. ({0})

text.name: PrintNoResults
text.value: There are currently no results available to print.

text.name: VerifyErrorContextLines
text.value: The number of context lines must be between {0} and {1}.

text.name: VerifyErrorFileType
text.value: You must supply the name of a file in which to search.

text.name: VerifyErrorNoStartPath
text.value: You must supply the path to begin the search.

text.name: VerifyErrorNoSearchText
text.value: You must supply text for which to search.

text.name: VerifyErrorGeneric
text.value: Unable to validate specified parameters. Please verify they are valid.

text.name: ResultsPreviewText
text.value: (21) Example results line and, match, displayed

text.name: TextEditorsErrorNoCmdLineForFile
text.value: No command line argument has been specified for the filename. Please specify the file argument under Tools->Options.

text.name: TextEditorsErrorNotDefined
text.value: No Text Editor was specified for the given file and no Text Editor is defined for all types. Please specify a Text Editor under Tools->Options

text.name: TextEditorsErrorGeneric
text.value: Error editing file {0}. The following problem occurred: {1}

text.name: TextEditorsAllTypesDefined
text.value: The all types Text Editor is already defined.

text.name: TextEditorsErrorFileTypeExists
text.value: The file type already exists. Please try again.
